import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { X, TrendingUp, DollarSign, BarChart3 } from 'lucide-react'; import { LineChart, Line, XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, Tooltip, Legend, ResponsiveContainer } from 'recharts'; const AdvancedValuationModal = ({ isOpen, onClose, onSubmit }) => { const [currentYear] = useState(new Date().getFullYear()); const years = [currentYear - 3, currentYear - 2, currentYear - 1, currentYear]; const [financialData, setFinancialData] = useState({ revenue: { [years[0]]: '', [years[1]]: '', [years[2]]: '', [years[3]]: '' }, gross_profit: { [years[0]]: '', [years[1]]: '', [years[2]]: '', [years[3]]: '' }, ebitda: { [years[0]]: '', [years[1]]: '', [years[2]]: '', [years[3]]: '' }, depreciation: { [years[0]]: '', [years[1]]: '', [years[2]]: '', [years[3]]: '' }, ebit: { [years[0]]: '', [years[1]]: '', [years[2]]: '', [years[3]]: '' }, profit_after_tax: { [years[0]]: '', [years[1]]: '', [years[2]]: '', [years[3]]: '' }, addbacks_total: { [years[0]]: '', [years[1]]: '', [years[2]]: '', [years[3]]: '' }, sde: { [years[0]]: '', [years[1]]: '', [years[2]]: '', [years[3]]: '' }, cash: { [years[0]]: '', [years[1]]: '', [years[2]]: '', [years[3]]: '' }, current_assets: { [years[0]]: '', [years[1]]: '', [years[2]]: '', [years[3]]: '' }, non_current_assets: { [years[0]]: '', [years[1]]: '', [years[2]]: '', [years[3]]: '' }, total_assets: { [years[0]]: '', [years[1]]: '', [years[2]]: '', [years[3]]: '' }, long_term_debt: { [years[0]]: '', [years[1]]: '', [years[2]]: '', [years[3]]: '' }, short_term_debt: { [years[0]]: '', [years[1]]: '', [years[2]]: '', [years[3]]: '' }, interest_bearing_debt: { [years[0]]: '', [years[1]]: '', [years[2]]: '', [years[3]]: '' }, equity: { [years[0]]: '', [years[1]]: '', [years[2]]: '', [years[3]]: '' }, total_liabilities_equity: { [years[0]]: '', [years[1]]: '', [years[2]]: '', [years[3]]: '' }, owner_salary: { [years[0]]: '', [years[1]]: '', [years[2]]: '', [years[3]]: '' }, family_salaries: { [years[0]]: '', [years[1]]: '', [years[2]]: '', [years[3]]: '' }, salary_adjustments: { [years[0]]: '', [years[1]]: '', [years[2]]: '', [years[3]]: '' }, auto_expenses: { [years[0]]: '', [years[1]]: '', [years[2]]: '', [years[3]]: '' }, donations: { [years[0]]: '', [years[1]]: '', [years[2]]: '', [years[3]]: '' }, insurance_premiums: { [years[0]]: '', [years[1]]: '', [years[2]]: '', [years[3]]: '' }, inventory_adjustments: { [years[0]]: '', [years[1]]: '', [years[2]]: '', [years[3]]: '' }, meals_entertainment: { [years[0]]: '', [years[1]]: '', [years[2]]: '', [years[3]]: '' }, personal_expenses: { [years[0]]: '', [years[1]]: '', [years[2]]: '', [years[3]]: '' }, phone_internet: { [years[0]]: '', [years[1]]: '', [years[2]]: '', [years[3]]: '' }, non_business_services: { [years[0]]: '', [years[1]]: '', [years[2]]: '', [years[3]]: '' }, travel: { [years[0]]: '', [years[1]]: '', [years[2]]: '', [years[3]]: '' }, one_time_charges: { [years[0]]: '', [years[1]]: '', [years[2]]: '', [years[3]]: '' }, retirement: { [years[0]]: '', [years[1]]: '', [years[2]]: '', [years[3]]: '' }, supplier_rebates: { [years[0]]: '', [years[1]]: '', [years[2]]: '', [years[3]]: '' }, other_addbacks: { [years[0]]: '', [years[1]]: '', [years[2]]: '', [years[3]]: '' }, }); const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('income'); const handleInputChange = (field, year, value) => { setFinancialData(prev => ({ ...prev, [field]: { ...prev[field], [year]: value } })); }; const formatCurrency = (value) => { if (!value) return '$0'; return new Intl.NumberFormat('en-US', { style: 'currency', currency: 'USD', minimumFractionDigits: 0, maximumFractionDigits: 0, }).format(value); }; const prepareChartData = () => { return years.map(year => ({ year: year.toString(), 'Gross Profit': parseFloat(financialData.gross_profit[year]) || 0, 'EBITDA': parseFloat(financialData.ebitda[year]) || 0, 'SDE': parseFloat(financialData.sde[year]) || 0, })); }; if (!isOpen) return null; const chartData = prepareChartData(); return (

{item.label} handleInputChange(item.field, year, e.target.value)} className="w-full px-2 py-1 border rounded" placeholder="$0" />
)} {activeTab === 'charts' && (

)}
); }; export default AdvancedValuationModal;
